ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Beautiful material, a very good Professor, light homework. Definitely worth taking.
Recommended. The topic is necessary for all the physics students and one can get deep understanding of the subject in this class.
I would recommend the class to any theorist, as the renormalization group methods were quite interesting and important for any modern-day researcher.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The knowledge I gained from the class is probably not essential for my research since it is a different field, but it is important to know how those important concepts like phenomenological mean-field and RG were developed and work for a physics student at least once in his/her career.
